title: Bayern head coaches in the Bundesliga
snippet: The head coaches from promotion in 1965 until today.

title: FC Bayern Munich - Wikipedia
snippet: ... Bayern has had 20 coaches since its promotion to the Bundesliga in 1965. Udo Lattek, Giovanni Trapattoni and Ottmar Hitzfeld served two terms as head coach. Franz Beckenbauer served one term as head coach and one as caretaker, while Jupp Heynckes had four separate spells as coach, including ...

title: From Zlatko Čajkovski to Vincent Kompany: A history of Bayern Munich coaches | Bundesliga
snippet: He subsequently became Germany coach, taking over at the international helm from another former Bayern man, Hansi Flick. Julian Nagelsmann oversaw 84 games at the Bayern Munich helm.

title: Vincent Kompany - Wikipedia
snippet: Vincent Jean Mpoy Kompany (born 10 April 1986) is a Belgian professional football manager and former player who played as a centre-back. He is the head coach of Bundesliga club Bayern Munich.

title: Bayern Munich - Current and former staff | Transfermarkt
snippet: FC Bayern München Youth · Bayern Munich UEFA U19 · The record of current and former staff lists all coaches, presidents, athletic directors, etc. who have ever worked for the selected club, along. Under "Position", you can select a specific role from the drop-down menu.
